entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
